data.title: Old style hotel restaurant with intimate service.
data.text: I was in Pittsburgh for business and staying at the Omni William Penn Hotel.  I had breakfast and lunch at the Terrace Room for two days.  the room was sumptuously furnished and decorated.  The first day for breakfast i was running late and needed to get in and out in about 15 minutes.  The staff accomplished that task with ease.  On each subsequent visit I was greeted by name and I was able to call the wait staff by name.   The food was quite good at breakfast and lunch and the service was always topnotch.  My whole recollection of my stay in Pittsburgh was enhanced by the hotel and its restaurant.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Love this review! Thank you for sharing your experiences in the Terrace Room!  We will make sure the Terrace Room staff and our very talented culinary team see your high praise.    They will take pride in being recognized for their service, hospitality, and excellence in preparation and presentation of our menu items.  We hope you will plan a return visit soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Staff!
data.text: Great place to meet for business.  Professional staff knows how to give top service. Had a business lunch meeting and the attention we received from Josh was just right!  Good food too.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for mentioning Josh!  We will be sure to share your comments with him.  The Terrace Room is a beautiful dining room and the perfect spot for a breakfast or lunch meeting.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to seeing you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Historic room, but just average food
data.text: We had Sunday brunch here - the lines were long, the food was only OK.  But they did  have a wide selection of baked goods, cold cuts and fruits.  The prepared hot foods were not that good.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello, Lorina.  Thank you for your comments regarding Sunday Brunch.  We are disappointed with your comments regarding the hot foods on the buffet, and will be addressing this with our culinary team.  We appreciate you dining with us in the Terrace Room and we hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Top Notch
data.text: Great majestic surrounding. The food was very contemporary, upscale and well prepared. The wait staff was very attentive and accommodating. Truly a great dining experience.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Joseph, we are so pleased to know you had a great dining experience in the Terrace Room.  We are so proud of the talents of our culinary team and the waitstaff are the BEST!  Thank you, Joseph, for posting your experience, and for choosing the Terrace Room.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Sunday brunch!
data.text: Nice variety of breakfast items including gluten free and locally grown/produced. Waffles, pancakes, french toast on request. We were too full from the buffet and chef-made omelettes but will save room for French toast next time as the neighboring table ordered it and it smelled and looked fabulous. Impeccable service. If not included in your package, purchase breakfast from the Concierge if you're a Select Guest for a very affordable price.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Mimi, thank you for commenting on your Sunday Brunch experience in the Terrace Room.  We are proud to include local produce/products and appreciate you mentioning this in your review.  We can't wait to share your comments with our Terrace Room and culinary associates.  We know they will be so proud!  Thank you, Mimi.  We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Classic ambiance, with the service to match
data.text:
I read quit a few of the reviews, and after a particularly trying day, decided to splurge a bit.

Good choice.  The service was excellent, the hotel and restaurant have a very special feel.  The only knock is the inevitably rare "medium rare" steak, which was excellent.

Great for special occasions, or when you just need a "me" moment.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Kevin, thanks for choosing The Terrace Room....we are delighted you enjoyed your dining experience.  We appreciate your comments and hope you won't wait too long to return.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very Good Hotel Restaurant
data.text: The surroundings are elegant. The food is good and there are lots of levels of choices. I had lunch, breakfast buffet, and dinner here. All were good. Service was excellent

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Loved your review, thank you!  We will be sure to share your kind words with the Terrace Room staff and our very talented culinary team.  Thank you for dining with us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place!!
data.text: All around great experience! Good place for food and drinks. Nice place to enjoy some good food. The atmosphere in the place is very nice.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for your feedback!  So glad you enjoyed the Terrace Room.  We have a talented and skilled culinary team who takes great pride in their preparation and presentation of our menus.  We're looking forward to seeing you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Come here for a drink!
data.text: We wanted to check out the bar at the Terrace Room before our dinner reservation and we were not disappointed. They might make the best martini in the entire city of Pittsburgh!

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Woohoo!  Thanks for the great comments!  You can be sure we will share your compliments with the Terrace bar staff...we know they will be so pleased.  Hope you'll be back again for the best martini in Pittsburgh!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Large dining room. Good for business breakfast.
data.text: I stayed at the Omni and went down for breakfast. Ernesto was my great waiter. I had a specific "easy" order (eggs, bacon, fruit) and they made it with no problems. Many business teams there for breakfast. They also had a buffet set up.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Ellis, thank you for dining with us in the Terrace Room.  Ernesto is a gem!  He will always get your morning started on a positive note.  The grandeur and ambiance of the Terrace Room is unique and speaks to a bygone era.  So glad you enjoyed it and we will look for you again when you return to Pittsburgh.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Split personality dining
data.text: The restaurant is beautiful and elegant.  The soaring ceilings and beautiful decor definitely make this a special occasion type restaurant.  But then the food is upscale hotel dining type.  There was nothing wrong with it, it just doesn't have that special something a destination restaurant would.  It is a hotel restaurant.  The chef does do weddings and other banquets where you serve large numbers of people and you feel that dinner fits more that type of fare.  We were staying at the hotel and ate there the night we arrived.  It perfectly fits that type of dining.  I think the ambiance leads to higher expectations.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Ann, thank you for dining with us in the Terrace Room, and for your very kind comments regarding the decor and ambiance.  We will certainly share your review of your meal with our chef and his team.  We have a talented culinary team and we know they will appreciate your feedback.  Thank you!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Top notch elegant dining experience
data.text: Dining here is the whole package- an outstanding setting, with incredible amounts of room between diners. The service was professional and attentive, and the food was worthy of the reputation of the hotel. We brought in a birthday cake from an outside bakery, which the waiter was gracious enough to bring out with candles and serve. I imagined being Andrew Carnegie eating at home.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We just love your review!  Our Terrace Room staff and culinarians are simply the best!  You can be sure we will share this post with them.  We are so proud of the the talent and skill with which our culinarians prepare and present the menu, and the waitstaff who provide prompt and friendly service.  Thank you for sharing your experience!!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Accommodating! (and tasty)
data.text:
In restaurants with every number of stars, from the lowliest to the fanciest, I've had the sad situation of asking if I could get X dish but without the Y and been told no, it's pre-prepared, you can't just get this without the whatever ingredient in the sauce you're deathly allergic to.  And it makes sense.  A lot of dishes require lengths of time marinating, slow roasting, etc.  I get it.  I do.

Here, though, when we went for a couple's night out and thought the specials all sounded *amazing*, yet they all had some sort of shellfish involved, and I sheepishly declared my near-fatal allergic history with shellfish and asked if there were any way to get the shrimp replaced with chicken in *everything*, we were told YES.

It's so rare for me to see a fancy pasta dish as a chef's special that has shrimp where they will let you get it without shrimp.  It shouldn't be, now that I think about it, but it is.

So my experience here at the Terrace Room was that the room was stunning, our waiter was awesome (very helpful, very friendly, so silent when he moved it was spooky - one moment, no one there, then POOF!  There he is, with whatever we needed), the drinks were good and strong, the food was very good, and they were very accommodating for food allergies.  (Thank you thank you thank you!)

It's a great place for a date, and it's a safe place for those of us who tend to die around certain foods.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Amy, we loved your review!  We will be certain to share your comments with our Terrace Room staff and our team of super-talented culinarians who make every dish in the Terrace Room look and taste fantastic!  We appreciate your feedback and hope you will plan to return soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Average
data.text: There was one table of four loud people in the restaurant when we were seated- lots and lots of empty tables in the restaurant.  The hostess takes us to a table 1 foot away from the occupied table. Fortunately, a friend of ours came in the restaurant, and we got up and moved  to a quieter table for four.  We had the breakfast buffet which was ok -wish we had known about the omelet bar before we got our food.  Waiter did come by and refill coffee a lot.  I think the price was $20 pp.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Nellie, thank you for selecting the Terrace Room and for your feedback regarding your experience.  We appreciate your input and will address your comments with the team.  We hope to see you in the Terrace Room again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not worth the wait
data.text: Sat on the Terrace for the look. Nice view, thats it. Waited 50 minutes for our meal. The place was under staffed and the staff seemed unhappy. After waiting all that time the food was still mediocre at best.

data.title: Great breakfast buffet
data.text: I ate here twice-both times for breakfast buffet. Very good, large amount of foods and healthy foods also. A little pricey but saved from going out for something. Wait staff was a little snooty, but otherwise very good.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for sharingy our experiencs in the Terrace Room.  We are so pleased you enjoyed our breakfast buffet ~ we have a very talented culinary staff!  We will be sure to share your comments with them.  Hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great for a Business Lunch
data.text:
The Terrace Room is fast becoming my go-to restaurant for business lunches.

I have been to the Terrace Room about four times in this calendar year alone.

The service has always been professional and quick, the ambience good and tasty food to go along with it!

There are also great vegan/vegetarian options on the menu.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Blair, thank you for the great commens!  We can't wait to share with our Terrace Room and Culinary teams!  We have such a talented team of culinarians who take great pride in the preparation and presentation of our menu items.  Blair, thank you for your patronage and we look forward to your next visit!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Beautiful Dining Room
data.text: Our group had a post-meeting meal in the Terrace Room. Gracious services, decent food and they accommodated 10 people easily.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for choosing the Terrace Room following your recent meeting.  We are so proud of the talents and skill of our culinarians, and the wait staff are the best!  We will be sure to share your comments with them.  Thank you again for dining with us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Romantic Night Out
data.text:
My husband and I ate here for Valentine's Day 2016. The Terrace Room was running a limited menu, four course special for the holiday. Some people may have considered it a bit expensive ($65 a person,) however the menu included various items, such as lobster bisque and a lobster tail entree.  I had the stuffed duck, which was very good but I couldn't finish it all after my salad and appetizer! My husband had the lobster tail, which he picked because he had never had lobster before, and he really enjoyed it. 

It wasn't as crowded as we expected it would be at 7 pm, but the host did say that they had quite a few cancellations. The atmosphere was very nice and the service was very quick. We sat down just before 7 and we were out before 8 because our food came out quickly. I would have liked to go try their speakeasy, but I wasn't feeling well enough to go after dinner (which had absolutely nothing to do with the food!)

I would definitely like to go back on another night to try out their regular menu as well. I highly recommend it.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello, Alexandra. Thank you for the great review of your Valentine's Day dinenr in the Terrace Room!  We are so proud of the talent and skill of our culinary staff, and know they will be thrilled to see your comments.  Alexandra, we appreciate you recommending the Terrace Room and look forward to seeing you soon.  Thank you!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fantastic Meal
data.text: The wait service was exceptional, the food was prepared to our request, and the ambience of the restaurant took us back in time to an era of elegance.

owner_response.author: WmPenn, Manager at Terrace Room, responded to this review
owner_response.text: William, thank you for visiting the Terrace Room and for your great comments.  We can't wait to share them with our staff.  We look forward to your next visit.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
